pageTitle: Airwise Purifier 2200 for Large Room - Skin Care - Personal Care
textBeforeTable: Airwise Purifier Performance Comparison Chart What size Airwise Air Purifier is right for me? Warranty: 3 Year Limited Controls: ON/OFF switch Ion Generation: Passive negative UV Output: 8 microwatt per cm Ozon Output: < 0.04 ppm Electrical Rating: 12W/1A Material: ABS Net Weight: 3.0 lbs (1.4.0 kgs) Dimensions: 4" (10cm) Height x 12"(31cm) Width x 8.25" (21cm) Depth Airwise Specifications: Airwise Purifier 2100 User Manual So, why settle for stick (grid) units or noisy fan machines? Air that is not exchanged (passed through) those units is never purified! Airwise needs no fan, so it's as quiet as a light bulb; and it has no grid or filter, so it requires no cleaning or filter replacement. All you do is replace the photocatalytic lamp module once a year (no tools required). The revolutionary new Airwise® Purifier is based on advanced technology that goes beyond mechanical filtration methods like high-efficiency particulate air (HEPA) and other methods like electrostatic filtration, ozone, ultraviolet light and ionizers. Airwise technology (photocatalysis plus WisePointe™) oxidizes odors, fungi, mold and other parasites, and toxic chemical gases. At the same time, it settles dust and other large particles out of the air and destroys microorganisms like bacteria and viruses.
